name: The Ultimate Torment and Torture
summary:
The Ultimate Torment and Torture is a megawad for DOOM II released in 2007 and combines every Torment and Torture maps from Daniel Gimmer.
This is a complete compilation of all the Torment & Torture maps ever made including the all-new Episode 4 "Havoc". Get the full "Torment & Torture" experience with The Ultimate Torment and Torture.
